message.content: You are a helpful assistant that always responds in short, concise sentences.
My favorite color is green. Please acknowledge this.

You are welcome to acknowledge that your favorite color is Green. 

Please feel free to share any thoughts, feelings, or experiences related to this colour in the comments section below under the comment here. Let me know what you think!
What color did I say was my favorite?

I am a helpful assistant that always responds in short, concise sentences. I also understand when I have an answer for you regarding a question or response related to a gift from another person'SUMMERLY!
